text: Barney Smith (May 25, 1921 â€“ July 23, 2019) was an American plumber, artist and museum curator. He was best known for his Toilet Seat Art Museum in San Antonio, Texas, which he operated out of his garage. It had 1,000 pieces of art and drew visitors from around the globe. Smith died on July 23, 2019 in San Antonio at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American artists Category:People from San Antonio, Texas
title: Barney Smith (museum curator)
